Silje Ljosland Bakke, Helse Vest IKT AS, Norway

Temple LK, Bacik J, Savatta SG, Gottesman L, Paty PB, Weiser MR, Guillem JG, Minsky BD, Kalman M, Thaler HT, Schrag D, Wong WD. The development of a validated instrument to evaluate bowel function after sphincter-preserving surgery for rectal cancer. Dis Colon Rectum. 2005 Jul;48(7):1353-65. doi: 10.1007/s10350-004-0942-z. PubMed PMID: 15868235.
Chen TY, Emmertsen KJ, Laurberg S. What Are the Best Questionnaires To Capture Anorectal Function After Surgery in Rectal Cancer?. Curr Colorectal Cancer Rep. 2015;11:37-43. doi: 10.1007/s11888-014-0217-6. Review. PubMed PMID: 25663833; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4317515.

details.purpose: To record the results for each component parameter and their total sum for the MSKCC Bowel Function Instrument.
details.keywords: Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Centre Bowel Function Instrument, MSKCC BFI, MSKCC, cancer, rectal, colorectal
details.use: Use to record the results for each component parameter and their total sum for the MSKCC Bowel Function Instrument.

items.items: MSKCC Bowel Function Instrument
Questionnaire for assessing bowel function after sphincter-preserving surgery for rectal cancer.
History
@ internal @
Over the last 4 weeks
The standard "over the last 4 weeks" recording of the MSKCC Bowel Function Instrument.
Tree
@ internal @
How many bowel movements in 24h?
How many bowel movements do you generally have in 24 hours?
Certain solid foods increase the number of bowel movements in a day
Do certain solid foods increase the number of bowel movements in a day?
Certain liquids increase the number of bowel movements in a day
Do certain liquids that you drink increase the number of bowel movements in a day?
Feel like had totally emptied your bowels after a bowel movement
Do you feel like you have totally emptied your bowels after a bowel movement?
Go to the toilet on time
Do you get to the toilet on time?
Had another bowel movement within 15 min of your last bowel movement
Do you have another bowel movement within 15 minutes of your last bowel movement?
Know the difference between gas and bowel movement
Do you know the difference between having to pass gas (air) and needing to have a bowel movement?
Had used medicines to decrease the number of bowel movements
Have you used medicines to decrease the number of bowel movements (drugs like ImodiumÂ®, LomotilÂ®)?
Had diarrhea
Have you had diarrhea (no form, watery stool)?
Had loose stool
Have you had loose stool (slight form, but mushy)?
Had been able to wait 15 min to get to the toilet
Have you been able to wait 15 minutes to get to the toilet when you feel like you are going to have a bowel movement?
Were able to control the passage of gas
Have you been able to control the passage of gas (air)?
Had limited the types of solid foods to control bowel movements
Have you limited the types of solid foods you eat to control your bowel movements?
Had limited the types of liquids to control bowel movements
Have you limited the types of liquids you drink to control your bowel movements?
Had soilage of your undergarments during the day
Have you had soilage (leakage of stool) of your undergarments during the day?
Had used tissue, napkin, pad during day
Have you used a tissue, napkin, and/or pad in your undergarments during the day in case of stool leakage?
Had had soil undergarments in bed
Have you had soilage (leakage of stool) of your undergarments when you go to bed?
Had altered activities because of bowel function
Have you had to alter your activities because of your bowel function?
Always
Most of the time
Sometimes
Rarely
Never
Item tree
@ internal @
Total score
The total score of the MSKCC Bowel Function Instrument.
Extension
Additional information required to extend the model with local content or to align with other reference models or formalisms.
For example: local information requirements; or additional metadata to align with FHIR.
